segments.text: Did you meet the new girl in our sales department . She is taking the place of Maggie during her alternative leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did they finally fill that post , how come I haven't seen her ? She must have not been inducted yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess not , They haven't officially introduced her to the whole staff yet , she barely started yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is she just working temporarily ? What are they going to do when Maggie comes back from leave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If the new girl is competent , maybe they will promote her when that time comes .
segments.speaker: S1
